WELCOME TO CITIVERSE
Decentralized Living Space Co-creation
Decentralize the creation of living spaces
A striking 3D city simulated metaverse developed as a co-creation platform.
You can create your dream space with our exciting City Building gameplay.

CITIVERSE ECOSYSTEM

CITIVERSE ECOSYSTEM

Unleash your infinite creativity and build your dream world in Citiverse ecosystem

City Builder

Outdoor Construction Gameplay

City BuilderHome DecorationCity ExplorerCitiverse Game

CITIVERSE LIVING

Play, Design, Trade and Render to earn from your own world

Playing

Enjoy a variety of City Living Simulation games integrated into our ecosystem through Citiverse SDK.

Designing

Design to earn by freely creating, exhibiting, and selling your aesthetic assets in Citiverse.

Join our professional network, and take part in global contests to promote your personal brand with us!

Trading

Turn your in-game assets into real-money by trading or renting them on our Marketplace.

Real estate frenzy starts at any moment!

Rendering

Does your computer have a good graphics card? If yes, secure your opportunity to join our Decentralized Rendering Infrastructure.

Earn with us everyday!

Epic Buildings
https://sswalk.citiverse.io
Visitors can experience the city's epic buildings and iconic artifacts. Any city property can be promoted to be an iconic artifact when it meets the standards set by the City Council using DAO
GAMEPLAY
Buy land, design & decorate your living space
Entertainment Zones
OPEN PLATFORM FOR IN-GAME ENTERTAINMENT
Enjoy your free time at entertainment zones, where a wide variety of entertainment, such as game arcades, clubs, and theaters, is located. To fit the need of all metizens, we allow other 3rd party games to be integrated into this zone using Citiverse SDK.
City Planning
CITY PLANS CREATED BY DAO
The first city is planned by the inhouse team of Citiverse. From the 2nd city onwards, the community will contribute to the city plan through a DAO process.
Master plans of 5 cities will be gradually introduced.
Plan & Build on your land
DESIGN & BUILD LANDSCAPE, BUILDINGS, SKYSCRAPERS, VILLAS...
Buy land, build and design your landscape, buildings, and many interesting features on that land.
Earn by renting or selling your assets.
Design & Build your house
DECOR INTERIOR OF APARTMENTS
Design and decorate the interior of your apartment or villa.
Having friends over for party or sell/rent out for a passive income.
Entertainment Zones
OPEN PLATFORM FOR IN-GAME ENTERTAINMENT

FOUNDING MEMBERS
A team with highly experienced leaders in the field of software development, blockchain, architecture, design and game
Freddie Nguyen
Founder and CEO
Founder of House3D, a pioneer 3D/VR platform for home designing. 15 years working in software development

Co-founding Advisor
Founder of Icetea Labs, creator of GameFi.org and Red Kite

Chief Technology Officer
10 years working as technical leader of several startups in 3D/VR, blockchain and gaming

Founder of VietCG. 15 years of game graphics, landscape, architecture and home design

PARTNERS
Cooperate with the top global partners
House3D - one of the most advanced 3D design software developers in Asia
260,000
designers from more than 40 cities around the world
1,000,000
design render per year using House3D Cloud Rendering
500,000
3D models of furniture and home accessories already inputted
3,000+
Design concepts created every day
Ohze Game Studio - a game developer serving more than 50 millions players globally
An innovated platform for 3D rendering and AI inference using crowdsourced GPUs globally

ROADMAP

Our development journey

Q1-2024

IDO campaign: seed round

Demo for Apartment Design feature with default NFT furniture items

Demo for marketplace

Q3-2024

All default building items and some premium items in NFT marketplace

Home Design 1.0

City Builder demo

City Explorer demo

From 2025

Explore main gameplay with full landscape, architect and interior design features

Further game development

From 2018 to 2023

Preparation and Planning - Verify ideals

Build 3D/VR/AR core technologies

Build platform for house designing

Modelling/porting hundred thousand items of furniture and home accessories as input into the 3d platform

Build a connected community of thousands of designers, architects

Q2-2024

IDO campaign: strategic sales, private sales, public sales

Marketplace 1.0

Land block NFTs for first city

Home Design beta

Home Redecor beta

Q4-2024

City Builder alpha

Marketplace 2.0

Citiverse SDK alpha
